data.title: NEXT Summer Camps
data.meta_description: Begin your creative journey with this interactive and imaginative camp experience! You'll leave inspired to write, write, write.
data.text:
Good writing has the power to move people and change hearts. At Writing Camp, you’ll learn how to tell your own story, edit your work, and take inspiration from God’s creation. And you’ll even get to see all the amazing opportunities that could await you when you tour the Abeka publishing department.

Dedicated and experienced instructors will lead you on a creative journey full of helpful writing instruction and exercises. You’ll leave camp inspired—with new original works you can be proud of.
